Name: Rhinestone Cowgirl
Ingredients: 20 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: Tangy, citrus, cranberry and berry fruit laced with sweetened bourbon.
Nutrition: One serving of Rhinestone Cowgirl contains 240 calories
